abstract: Bebo, which AOL bought about two years ago for $850 million, could not overcome competition from Facebook.
snippet: Bebo, which AOL bought about two years ago for $850 million, could not overcome competition from Facebook.
lead_paragraph: AOL said on Thursday that it sold Bebo, the struggling social networking site, to Criterion Capital Partners, a private equity fund based in Los Angeles, for a fraction of what AOL paid for the site two years ago.

headline.main: AOL Sells Social Site to Investment Firm
headline.print_headline: AOL Sells Social Site to Investment Firm
